long_description: Don't let the hot sun stop you from having fun. The Columbia Coolhead(TM) Cachalot hat provides excellent UPF protection and features Omni-Freeze(R) Zero cooling fabric to keep you comfortable. Polyester/elastane fabric blend wicks moisture and dries fast to keep you comfortable on when you're on the go. Omni-Freeze Zero technology actually cools when moisture hits the surface to help you stay comfortable on hot days. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against the sun. Mesh side panels create great breathability. Fit of the The Columbia Coolhead Cachalot hat can be adjusted with a drawcord and toggle at the back.
short_description: Don't let the hot sun stop you from having fun. The Columbia Coolhead(TM) Cachalot hat provides excellent UPF protection and features Omni-Freeze(R) Zero cooling fabric to keep you comfortable.
